org.scec.sha.imr.gui
Class IMRGuiList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.scec.sha.imr.gui.IMRGuiList
public class IMRGuiList
extends java.lang.Object

Title: IMRGuiList
Description: IMRGuiList is just a container list of all the IMR guis that have been initialized for the IMR tester applet. For each IMR that is picked an IMR gui is created with the name of the IMR and then stored in the IMR gui list so that when that same IMR is requested again instead of recreating it it can just be accessed from this list. This list simply uses a hash map mapping the IMR gui names to the IMR gui beans.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:

See Also:
BJF_1997_IMR, AS_1997_IMR

Method Detail

setImr

public IMRGuiBean setImr(java.lang.String imrName,
                         IMRTesterApplet applet)
Sets the IMR attribute of the IMRGuiList object.In this function if the IMR exists and is already the selected one it returns what has been selected. If it is not the current it looks inside the hash map to see if it has already been instanciated and returns that then if not it creates a new IMRGuiBean from the IMR name adds it to the list sets it as the current and returns it.
Parameters:
imrName - This is the fully qualified package and class name of the IMR to implement.
applet - The main application that uses this list needed to create the IMRGuiBean.
Returns:
Description of the Return Value
